movie.title: The Christ Slayer
movie.description_intro: "The Christ Slayer" is part 3 of Collective Development Inc.'s THE QUEST TRILOGY following "40 Nights" (Part 1) and "Chasing the Star" (Part 2)
movie.description_full: "The Christ Slayer" is part 3 of Collective Development Inc.'s THE QUEST TRILOGY following "40 Nights" (Part 1) and "Chasing the Star" (Part 2)

movies.title: Race to Win
movies.summary: After losing her father, a young woman must find the strength to face her fears and compete in the race of her life or her family will lose everything.
movies.description_full: After losing her father, a young woman must find the strength to face her fears and compete in the race of her life or her family will lose everything.
movies.synopsis: After losing her father, a young woman must find the strength to face her fears and compete in the race of her life or her family will lose everything.

movies.title: Under the Skin
movies.summary: An alien entity inhabits the earthly form of a young woman who combs the roads and streets of Scotland in search of the human prey she came to plunder. She seduces her isolated and forsaken male victims into an otherworldly dimension where they are stripped and consumed. However, existence in all its complexity begin to change the alien visitor. She begins to discover herself as human with tragic and terrifying consequences.

movies.title: A Touch of Sin
movies.summary: Four independent stories set in modern China about random acts of violence.
movies.description_full: Four independent stories set in modern China about random acts of violence.
movies.synopsis: Four independent stories set in modern China about random acts of violence.

movies.title: Radioland Murders
movies.summary: In 1939, WBN, a fourth radio network, is about to take to America's airwaves. As if the confusion of the premiere night wasn't enough, Penny Henderson, the owner's secretary, must deal with an unhappy sponsor, an overbearing boss and a soon-to-be ex-husband who desperately wants her back. As the broadcast begins, a mysterious voice breaks the broadcast and suddenly members of the cast turn up dead. It's up to her husband Roger, to find out whodunit as the police chase him through the halls of WBN.
